Title: Increases the tax imposed on the sale of certain tobacco products and the retail sale of vapor products
Summary: Increases the tax imposed on the sale of certain tobacco products from 75% to 129% and increases the tax imposed on the retail sale of vapor products from 20% to 48%; makes conforming changes.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to increasing the tax imposed on the sale of tobacco products and the retail sale of vapor products
